title: Not banning KhaZix, he gets picked on enemy team = instant loss.
body: Getting oneshot from one auto after the enemy kha buys duskblade throughout the entire game feels so nice.

replies.body: the funniest part of these boards is looking at someone's op.gg prior to their complaint and seeing a game where they were a 1/8/1 vayne ranting about a 21/5 khazix and pondering, "hmm, i wonder what made them go to the LoL boards to complain?"

hahaha, you made me laugh hard

1/8 without armor expects not to get one shot

duskblade already ignores around 21 armor max


dem adc mains QQ

> [{quoted}](name=SiG DxD,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BWQU0IaQ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-02-15T21:33:02.441+0000)
>
> hahaha, you made me laugh hard
> 
> 1/8 without armor expects not to get one shot
> 
> duskblade already ignores around 21 armor max
> 
> 
> dem adc mains QQ

if he was a good adc he would be having enough vision to prevent such casualties, along with his supp. 1/8 is just embarrassing
You gotta be joking. If you believe that Kha'Zix is even on the top of the worst, you never faced a Karthus that powerfarms and kills you by clicking on his ultimate.

My favorite was a game where my team told me to just counterjungle the Karthus and then sat in lane while the Karthus and his team roamed into my jungle repeatedly and had so many wards in it I couldn’t clear them all before the sweeper ran out or they all just collapsed on me.

Then I got bitched at for the next 10 minutes as everyone got halved by the Karthus ult and cried “lol jungle difference”. Bite my ass...
To hell with Karthus jungle...

Wait kha has a 100% win rate? 

Damn, that's impressive.

Lol while I don't think OP is right. It's also funny to see this comment from someone not wanting nerfs to their "SuPRahIsE OnE-ShOt " cause I face rolled and pressed all my buttons 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

> [{quoted}](name=ReaperOfAnarachy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BWQU0IaQ,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2019-02-14T14:50:50.677+0000)
>
> Lol while I don't think OP is right. It's also funny to see this comment from someone not wanting nerfs to their "SuPRahIsE OnE-ShOt " cause I face rolled and pressed all my buttons 
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

khazix is max c tier jgler lol. Rengar is worse to play against in every circumstance that can be possibly imagined. People just don't know how to fight against KhaZix

Nah I know that to be true. Granted I personally think assassins are an unhealthy class for the game in general so I may be a bit skewed.
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
Kill khazix and he will die, easy
LMAO what? I'd expect the boards to call him S-tier but max c tier? Are you damn serious? He's honestly like A-tier.

> [{quoted}](name=WoodPeker,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BWQU0IaQ,comment-id=0009000000000001,timestamp=2019-02-15T04:22:31.757+0000)
>
> LMAO what? I'd expect the boards to call him S-tier but max c tier? Are you damn serious? He's honestly like A-tier.

He's "A-Tier" on paper but if you actually look at the champion he SHOULD be "C-Tier". The only reason he's as high as A tier is because he's a generally safe pick. The fact that this person made this shitpost about Kha'Zix just goes to show how obvious it is that he's salty that he can't abuse an early game Kha
Clearly trolling. Most tier sites I can see have him S tier and even rank 2.  You know this because...well your name.

> [{quoted}](name=VPPtrue,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BWQU0IaQ,comment-id=00090001,timestamp=2019-02-14T18:14:07.738+0000)
>
> Clearly trolling. Most tier sites I can see have him S tier and even rank 2.  You know this because...well your name.

no lol. The only reason he's even that high is purely because there are more Kha'Zix players than most other junglers. Trust me, if there were more Rengar players out there, then this post would very much be different, most notably the word with "Kha'Zix" changed to "Rengar", or any other jungle to be frank. The only reason people lose vs Kha'Zix is because they don't know how to play against him well. There's a difference between being hard to face and actually being broken
"stfu you god damn minority" sounds like a high quality shitpost
worse not banning a brand and a zix then they get picked now thats auto loss wait rengar top also good luck adc existing XD and teamfighting and isolation bonus
Wow you just made a post that has done nothing for the community or the game. give a reason hes broken. and a way you wanna see it fixed instead of just crying on here.
Team picks Kha. Goes farm in the jungle doing no ganks. Autoloses.
Reset your op.gg before you make a thread like this.
**Fuck man! They didn't ban [insert champ you don't like here] and now its an insta lose no matter what happens**
Odd...seems that every Kha Zix i get on my team feeds.
Lol what the fuck do you mean? Don't you just love hearing it once on you than going gray than hearing it 2 more times on others? am i not right?
You are on the wrong patch my guy. Khazix aint shit anymore.

How To Counter K6 101
- Dont be alone

Buy this:
Literally any armor item {{item:3047}} {{item:3157}}

if he so insta lose, just pick him and one shot everyone with dusk blade alone

and your freaking main vayne who have both better use and win rate...
Not banning eve means 60-70% chance for me to win in Plat 5 or below.

> [{quoted}](name=Serika Zero,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BWQU0IaQ,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-02-14T11:16:20.209+0000)
>
> Not banning eve means 60-70% chance for me to win in Plat 5 or below.

**Plat 5**

What's that?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
A precious metal 😉

On a side note...had a fun Kha bug where he was getting the isloation buff on me even if Fizz was next to me or even aouting him as well.... only fizz... every other ally was fine, but if Fizz was around, he didn't count as an ally for some reason.  

I noticed the range on his attacks.... and when we got hit with his W as he was running away from Fizz and I... I got slowed, Fizz didnt... so I asked him to look for the little ring around me and if it disappeared when I ran to Fizz, and yup it stayed... he didn't notice till I asked him. Wrong forum, and noone probably cares! but... Kha thread! K bye
Isn't that every champion that buys duskblade first?

you spelled Yasuo wrong.

All jokes aside i am sure everyone hs those set of champions that they feel like its an auto loss if they have to deal with them, mines being Yasuo.
khazix needs nerfs on his isolation damage

Personally think that although kha'zix needs a nerf, nerfing his isolation damage only makes his counter play and niche less meaningful. He probably needs the isolation radius increased in order to reward better timing and smarter play and punish people who don't play into his strengths.

My only problem with Khazix i his ability to buffer all of his skills into his jump. Its the same shit that makes rengar dumb. having the bug jump on me and simultaneously hit me with Q W an auto and his tiamat reset seems pretty dumb
Kha is strong but not that much. Maybe you need more time to understand how to play against him.
just play tahm lol
wait this had a lot of likes at first...what the hell happened?
